name: Kiwi in a jam
description:
Kiwi in a jam is a puzzle game where the objective is to get all the kiwis from one burrow to the other.

To do so, the kiwis must traverse through the dirt road to get to their destined burrow. Players can change the direction of where these roads lead or where the kiwi can be at a time.

Help these kiwis get to their home!
